name: Sound Gatherer
description:
SOUND GATHERER

What if UFOs had a museum in which they keep the sounds of the Earth? Well, something similar to what we see in this game would happen.

This game developed in Unreal is the result of wanting to widening our knowledge in this engine.

Controls:

AWSD - movement.

F - Level Selection.

Right mouse click - interaction with main objects.

Credits:

Jorge Aranda - Sound, Production, Designer.

Silvia Osoro - Programming.
